basic.description: This course continues calculus concepts from APSC-171, including space curves, speed, velocity. Functions of several variables, partial derivatives, differentials, error estimates, gradient, maxima and minima. Double and triple integrals, polar and cylindrical coordinates; applications to mass, center of mass, moment. Series, power series; Taylor polynomial approximations, error analysis.
basic.subject: APSC
basic.title: Calculus II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of APSC171  and registered in a BSCE or UENG Academic Program.
